title: OnePlus Nord CE4 (Celadon Marble, 8GB RAM, 128GB Storage)  Lifetime Display Warranty  Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 - Best in The Segment  50 MP Camera with OIS

script.hook: Tired of your phone slowing you down? Meet the OnePlus Nord CE4!
script.pitch: Experience lightning-fast performance and stunning visuals powered by the Snapdragon 7 Gen 3.
script.features: Capture every moment in breathtaking detail with a 50 MP camera. Enjoy 7.3 hours of streaming with just a 10-minute charge!
script.cta: Don't miss out! Grab your OnePlus Nord CE4 today for just ₹21,997!
visual_cues: Scene 1: Close-up of the OnePlus Nord CE4 spinning to showcase the Celadon Marble finish.
Scene 2: Quick cuts of users multitasking, gaming, and capturing photos.
Scene 3: A delighted customer unboxing and using the phone in various scenarios.
Scene 4: Bold text overlay with 'Order Now!' and the price, alongside the product.

metadata.product_title: OnePlus Nord CE4 (Celadon Marble, 8GB RAM, 128GB Storage)  Lifetime Display Warranty  Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 - Best in The Segment  50 MP Camera with OIS

product_analysis.target_audience: tech-savvy young professionals and students looking for a high-performance smartphone at an affordable price
emotional_triggers: fear of missing out on the latest technology
need for social connectivity and entertainment
product_analysis.value_proposition: Unmatched performance with Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 and lifetime display warranty at an affordable price
product_analysis.competitive_advantage: 100W SUPERVOOC charging and 50 MP camera with OIS in a budget-friendly smartphone
